solution_line_template: On the first and second days, Nala found {first_day} + {second_day} = <<{first_day}+{second_day}={first_two_days}>>{first_two_days} seashells.
On the third day, she found {first_two_days} x {multiplier_third_day} = <<{first_two_days}*{multiplier_third_day}={third_day}>>{third_day} seashells.
